content:
# I have successfully crafted a stone furnace. My inventory now contains 1 stone furnace, 10 wood, 5 stone, and 10 iron ore.
# The next step is to place the stone furnace so that I can start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.

# I will place the stone furnace at my current position.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=0.5, y=0.5))  # Adjust the position if necessary.

# After placing the furnace, I will verify the entities again to ensure it has been placed correctly.
print(f"Entities after placing stone furnace: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory after placing stone furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
